temporal_logic_formulars.sentence: 3.The vehicle will not lean more than 45 degrees (this angle is adjustable with the ACRO_BAL_ROLL and ACRO_BAL_PITCH parameters)

temporal_logic_formulars.sentence: 4.The altitude is maintained with the altitude hold controller so the vehicle will attempt to hold its current altitude when the sticks are placed with 10% of mid-throttle.

temporal_logic_formulars.sentence: It will climb or descend at up to 2.5m/s (this speed is adjustable with the PILOT_SPEED_UP and PILOT_SPEED_DN parameters).

temporal_logic_formulars.sentence: The acceleration used to establish these speeds is set by PILOT_ACCEL_Z.
